actions.message:
*Ticket system*
___!!active,!!add,!!close,!!forceclose,!!inactive,!!new,!!reactsetup,!!remove,!!reqstaff,!!req,!!supportetup,!!ticketlog.___

***If you find any bug or command not working pls do !!bugreport [reason] so i can fix it***

***Bot last Updated 2:55 pm
Friday, 18 October 2019 (IST)
Time in India***

name: prefix
desc:
Change your servers prefix by doing %prefix%prefix [prefix] and the bot will respond using that.

The prefix can be anything, it doesn't just have to be a symbol!

actions.message: Prefix is already set to `${tempVars("tag")}` Do `!!prefix [newprefix]` to change it.
actions.name: Send Message
